domain_terms.RTO: Recovery Time Objective - Maximum acceptable downtime before business impact becomes unacceptable
domain_terms.RPO: Recovery Point Objective - Maximum acceptable data loss measured in time
domain_terms.DR: Disaster Recovery - Process and procedures for recovering IT systems after a disaster
domain_terms.Failover: Automatic switching to redundant system when primary system fails
domain_terms.Backup: Copy of data stored separately for recovery purposes
domain_terms.HA: High Availability - System design ensuring minimal downtime through redundancy
domain_terms.BCP: Business Continuity Plan - Documented procedures for maintaining business operations during disruptions
domain_terms.Hot Site: Fully operational backup facility ready for immediate failover
domain_terms.Cold Site: Backup location with basic infrastructure requiring configuration before use
domain_terms.Warm Site: Partially configured backup facility requiring some setup time
